title: Sports doubts
content:
Is there any football team in the main campus?
If any, do they participate in regional/intercollege championships?
How hard is it to get into one?
Im in 12th rn and ive been preparing for kcet and pessat. Hope to meet you guys soon!

comments.body:
Yes, there are multiple sports teams in the college, once you join, you can reach out to the sports department for selection dates

Good Luck for the preparation to get into PES!
yes its there , its very tough to get inside the team tho you have to be really good.
